ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: shoulders...
ygData.msgSnippet: Been camping the Hole a LOT and yet to see one drop.  A Warrior buddy of mine is DYING for one.. Slyde ... From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@hotmail.com]
ygData.messageBody:
Been camping the Hole a LOT and yet to see one drop. A Warrior buddy of
mine is DYING for one..

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 9:07 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: shoulders...


> Just curious, i became the happy owner of a songshawl
> last night, and was wondering what other high level
> bards are using as a shoulderpiece... could i be
> looking for a better shoulderpiece out there?
>


Well, at 55, I would not consider myself "high level", but I am using
the granite spaulders from the Hole. AC 20 and +resist across the
board, but they weight 18 or so...

Gaelthorne
Xegony
